body.name: Mini Portable Washing Machine - Folding Washing Machine - Bucket Washer for Clothes Laundry- Collapsible Washing Machine - Underwear Washing Machine for Camping, RV, Travel, Small Spaces
features: Mini Foldable Portable Washer - Convenient and tiny washing machine; only 4 inches thick; Perfect portable washer for apartments, condos, motor homes, RVs, camping, and more; Wash your clothes whenever and wherever you want.

Simple to Use Washing Maschine- Comes with a charger and an automatic button; Add water with detergent and clothes; Wait for six spins till your clothes are clean; No dryer included. Recommended as underwear washer or baby washing machine.

Made of Highest Quality - Our mini foldable washing machine is made out of premium safe and non-toxic material; Made out of a unique combination of edible grade silicone and BPA-free plastic; Can be used for many years.

Easy to Store, Foldable, and Lightweight - Our washer is adjustable and can be placed under the table, small washroom, or in a suitcase; Comes with a hand carry and a lid to cover. Great as a camping washing machine.

Affordable Multipurpose Investment - This mini portable washing machine saves both your time and water; Can be used for everything from baby clothes, underwear but even jewelry as well as fruits and vegetables; Load size 4LBS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Small but mighty, it cleans really well and empty’s really easy and folds down too be put away this was a great purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Revised review after using it a couple of times
reviews.reviewText: It's useless for anything other that running soapy water through your wash items. I put some medium soiled rags through the was. None of them came clean at all, not even a little bit. The fact that it doesn't have any kind of spin function or something that would make them not be sopping wet when you pull stuff out makes it that much more of a useless purchase. This washer is the equivalent of throwing your items into a sink with water in it then stirring it mildly with a spoon for 5-15 minutes. Then I had to pull the rags out one by one and wring them out by hand to get the excess water out of them. I'm returning this and saving up for a slightly more expensive one that actually washes and spins my cloth items. I honestly can't see this tub being useful for anything but making your wash smell nicer than before you washed them. I just wanted to have something small I could clean my rags and small clothing items in then hang out to dry. This is not it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works good with small items.
reviews.reviewText: It is a little heavy especially if full of water. It can't be filled above 1/2 of the top ring or it will run outon what ever it is set on. Don't put to much into it or it won't wash well. When done washing it has to be wiped out dry with a towel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small items ONLY
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to help with my travels and hoping to be able to wash clothes on the Go. Unfortunately, it doesn’t or cannot take more than 2 items per wash. So basically, one bra and one underwear and that way good for it to wash per load.I figured I’d have better luck washing my clothes with a big bucket and detergent and my hands!I wasn’t too thrilled with it and had to return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unfortunately Did Not Work
reviews.reviewText: I was looking so forward to getting my little mini washer. Unfortunately I received a defective unit which was replaced with yet another defective unit. I was like a little kid in a toy store, excited and couldn't wait to hook it up and start washing clothes, just to be disappointed when it didn't work. Instructions were very vague - did not give a lot of detail for setting up. Item appears to be slightly different from what appears in the photo on Amazon. Both machines I received had no working button. Maybe I'll try again someday and instead of ordering a pink one, I'll have better luck with a blue one.I would have rated higher if the item had worked.
Es pequeña pero lava muy bien, la quería para trapos de cocina y me resultó muy útil, se ve de material frágil pero espero que me dure mucho tiempo

reviews.reviewTitle: It is a toy but it washes!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. A little more expensive than I wanted to pay for it in canada but nevertheless I needed a small portable washer for my table wash cloths that I used in the kitchen. Probably will use it for my underwear, socks and any small items. Of course just like a good cook just put in a random amount of hot water, random amount of detergent, hold the button for two seconds and it doesn't start after a minute or so it might be on pause, just tap it again and it should start. It spins in one direction for a seconds, stops and spins in the other direction.. then after a few minutes, it vibrates. Now here is the thing... the ultrasonic and vibration is probably all a trick much like the vibration motor on your phone, but nevertheless it vibrates. I looked it up on the internet about ultrasonic for washing clothes and on the internet it says that it isn't effective as the ultrasonic is absorbed by your fabrics so it doesn't really do anything if real. Plus ultrasonic is a high pitch vibration and now a low thrum which makes me think that this is just a trick. Anyways it does rotate and agitate your wash and the water does turn muddy and murky with dirt so it does what a washer does, perhaps not as clean as if you were to put it in a real washer but nevertheless at minimum it washes like you would if you put your laundry into a tub and hand wash it. Once the full cycle is complete, just dump out the water and surprisingly it isn't that heavy. I do wish there was a sprout on it and dumping the water out using a corner of the device still makes the water run down the side of the device thus I recommend pulling the plug out before pouring the water out. Once the water is poured out, I use one hand to squeeze the washcloths to simulate the spin cycle and then I filled the bucket with hot water again for rinse. I then start the 9 minute cycle again and this time the water is still muddy and murkey showing that my washcloths were really dirty. Poured the rinse water out... rinse each under the tap and hang to dry. Place the tub upside down in the sink too dry... then collapse and find a nice place to store it, most probably under the sink. Not bad for a portable washer. My only concern that it will stop working due to the motor burning out. Will report in a year or so but so far I am happy with it even though I think the ultrasonic is just a gimmick but it works otherwise for small amount of bachelor laundry. Better than spending $20 for the coin operate Laundromat in my apartment. Just saved $20.
Nunca sirvió, NUNCA. La tengo como cubeta estorbosa.
Not good enough, try stronger one
I didn't check properly and didn't see there was no drain and no drying basket, so the clothes are SOAKING wet, really long to dry unless put in the dryer.
